forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies this morning will give way to mostly cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early then increasing cloudiness this afternoon. High near 65F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
